gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 113, Raptors 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pistons defeated the Raptors, 113-104. Jalen Duren led the Pistons with 24 points (8-9 FG), a career-high 23 rebounds, and five assists as Cade Cunningham added 19 points and six assists. Immanuel Quickley totaled 25 points, five rebounds, and eight assists for Toronto as Kelly Olynyk added 19 points, six rebounds, and eight assists. The Pistons improve to 12-53 as the Raptors move to 23-43.
